name: What'sApp accent color only
description:
If you really like the default white and only extra color, take this. Not very sophisticated, I know.

This is a temporary solution I do NOT recommend anyone even considering using it.
I rather recommend using my dark WA skin: https://userstyles.org/styles/116758/black-other-color-wa

user.name: Millie Vanilli
